attributes.action: Introduce a licencing system for pedal cyclists and make it an offence to cycle in the dark without adequate lights.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Unlit cyclist are a manace on our roads. They should be subject to the same controls and regulations as motorists.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
